thread.title: New York Yankees host Houston Astros in AL wild card game: Pitching matchup, start time, what TV channel, how to watch online
thread.title_full: New York Yankees host Houston Astros in AL wild card game: Pitching matchup, start time, what TV channel, how to watch online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: New York Yankees host Houston Astros in AL wild card game: Pitching matchup, start time, what TV channel, how to watch online
text:
The New York Yankees will host the Houston Astros on Tuesday in the American League wild card game. The winner moves on to face the Kansas City Royals in a best-of-five Division Series beginning Thursday in Kansas City.
Here are details on how to watch the AL wild card game, including TV channel and live stream information.
What: Houston Astros (86-76) at New York Yankees (87-75)
Where: Yankee Stadium, New York
When: Tuesday, October 6, at 5:08 p.m. PT/8:08 p.m. ET
TV channel: TV on ESPN, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online: Watch the live stream at WatchESPN , listen at ESPNRadio.com
Season series: Astros won 4-3
Pitching matchup: New York's Masahiro Tanaka (12-7, 3.51 ERA) vs. Houston's Dallas Keuchel (20-8, 2.48 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
